snippet.title: Little Cities | Little Citizens Update Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
Beachside bathers, sprightly swimmers, and racetrack riders – lend us your ears! We’re absolutely delighted to announce that the free Little Citizens Update for Little Cities is out now on the Meta Quest platform. 

The update brings your creations to life with your very own tiny population. Watch the itty-bitty bustle in your city streets and discover all the ways they love to work, rest, and play.

City creation in virtual reality has never been so cozy. 

Learn More 👉 https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/developer-post/573251621423075/
----
Get Little Cities 👉 https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/
----
👍 Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/user/nDreamsVR?sub_confirmation=1
----
💻 Learn More - https://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
🐦 Twitter - https://twitter.com/nDreams
💬 Discord - https://discord.com/invite/ndreams
👽 Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/nDreamsVR
📱 TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@ndreamsvr
📷 Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ndreams_vr/
💼 LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/ndreams

#quest2 #metaquest2
